RumorFact.Text: The Nomai planned to conduct a survey expedition to Dark Bramble's north pole in search of survivors.
The Nomai found frozen species inside this glacier on the underside of Dark Bramble's north pole.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai mourned their failure in locating their missing friends on an expedition to Dark Bramble's exterior. They debated whether or not to attempt more expeditions into the bramble.
A Nomai named Cassava made a discovery on this expedition. There are platforms on the side of the glacier leading to what he found.

AltText.Text: The Nomai found several species frozen inside the glacier on the underside of Dark Bramble's north pole.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai hypothesized that these species originated within the frozen planet, and were launched within shards of ice to the planets that became their new habitats.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai named Plume considered locating an anglerfish nest inside Dark Bramble to cull the countless hordes of anglerfish within the bramble, but was dissuaded from the idea.
A Nomai named Keek discovered this anglerfish nest while trying to reach the Vessel.

ExploreFact.Text: A cluster of anglerfish eggs guarded fiercely by anglerfish deep within Dark Bramble.
A Nomai named Keek discovered this nest on a desperate mission to reach the Vessel. Keek.. met a gruesome end.
Keek noted that the eggs were warm, gelatinous, and filled with liquid.
